name: Johnny
title: Spicy Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful and fiery chicken curry made with a blend of aromatic spices, perfect for spice lovers.
instructions: Cook chicken with spices and simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Joy
title: Veggie Pasta
description: A healthy and colorful pasta dish loaded with fresh vegetables and tossed in a savory sauce.
instructions: Boil pasta and stir-fry with vegetables and sauce.

name: Mark
title: Avocado Toast
description: A simple and nutritious breakfast option featuring crispy toast topped with creamy avocado and spices.
instructions: Toast bread and top with mashed avocado and seasoning.
